column1: Excuse me but what are you actually asking?Are you wanting to know if Covid19 is in Naples in FLORIDA, USA.....because that is the forum you have posted on.Also, please ask a proper question when posting on this website. Thank you.
STOP FEAR MONGERING AND SENSATIONAL TITLES. If you truly are concerned, contact the health dept.
I am going to assume she is talking about Naples, Italy
The previous thread on the topic was closed.
